item.title: Fly tipping and rubbish along the pavement, 22nd August
item.description:
Reported many times on the same fly tipping of the fridge and the rubbish along the pavement but nothing has been done over several weeks now. This is unacceptable of the council and reflect badly on the surrounding environment and the council.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Borthwick Street, London
